home.title: Welcome <1>
home.description: This site provides origami templates to create paper boxes. Perfect for board games, but not only.

beta.title: This site is under heavy construction.
beta.text: As a result, it is likely to change drastically from one release to the other. Just saying...  :)

pattern.title: Masu
pattern.subtitle: The swiss knife of the boxes
pattern.description: The Masu template allows you to choose all dimensions of the box and it is generally suited for any box that don't have to be tall.

templates.title: My templates
templates.error: An error occurs - Can't retrieve the templates

profile.title: Your Profile
profile.facebookDescription: Here are the data retrieved via Facebook login that we use to identify you and provide the service
profile.userIdDescription: This identifier is unique to you and to the corniro.com application. As such, it is the sole information that we store to identify your creation and interaction
profile.name: Display Name
profile.nameDescription: The name that you choose on Facebook, this information is retrieved via Facebook API and can be changed in your Facebook profile
profile.pictureDescription: The public profile picture that you choose on Facebook. This information is retrieved via Facebook API and can be changed in your Facebook profile
profile.storageDescription: Here is a summary of the data that you have created by using the corniro.com service
profile.localStorageDescription: Those data are stored by your browser and cleaning-up your cache could delete those information. They can be removed by using the 'Delete' link in the 'My Templates' page
profile.remoteStorageDescription: Those data are stored on our remote datastore. They can be removed by using the 'Delete' link in the 'My Templates' page

danger.title: Danger zone
danger.content: The following actions can be used to clean-up your profile or delete it. Those actions are irreversible.
danger.localCleanDescription: This action will remove any template stored locally.
danger.removeDescription: This action will remove locale and remote stored data, destroying any templates and content linked to your profile.

localCleanModal.title: Clean-up local data
localCleanModal.content: This action will remove all information stored on this computer and linked to corniro.com. This action is irreversible.

removeModal.title: Remove your Profile
removeModal.content: This action will remove all your templates and all your data on both this computer and on our datastore. This action is irreversible.

modal.unsavedContent: Discard the local template <1>{{title}}</1>? This template will be lost.
modal.draftContent: Discard the local version of the template <1>{{title}}</1>? This template will be reset to its remote version.
modal.remoteContent: Discard the template <1>{{title}}</1>? This template will be lost.

stepAGeneral.title: General options
stepAGeneral.withDesignOff: Only the folding template will be prepared
stepAGeneral.withDesignOn: You will be able to use images and texts to design the box
stepAGeneral.withLidOn: A second template will be prepared for the lid of the box
stepAGeneral.deltaExplanation: Difference between lid length/width compared to the base of the box
stepAGeneral.lidHeightExplanation: The height of the lid will be calculated to ensure that the patron of both the base and the lid have the same size

stepCText.familyExplanation: Name of the google font to be used

dimensions.label: What are the dimensions of the box (in millimeters)?
